An '''awkward potion''' is a potion that provides no effects. It is used as the basis for brewing most other potions.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Nether Wart
|base = Water Bottle
|Awkward Potion
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base = Awkward Potion
|Awkward Splash Potion
|name = Awkward Splash Potion
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Awkward Splash Potion
|Awkward Lingering Potion
|name = Awkward Lingering Potion
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Awkward Splash Potion'''
|foot=1
}}

== Usage ==
===Base potions===
Awkward potion is a base potion. It has no effect when the player drinks it, but is necessary as the basis for other potions.

=== Lingering potion ===
{{IN|bedrock}}, a lingering awkward potion acts similar to the [[lingering water bottle]], being able to extinguish burning entities and damage [[endermen]], [[blaze]]s, and [[snow golem]]s, but without the ability to put out fires.
